means: 射中接近靶心部分的一发

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"内部的，内在的"之意。
means: inner ： 含义广泛，指事物中心或接近中心的部位，也可指内心隐密的活动。
inside ： 多指处于某物内部或靠近内部，常可与inner换用，可引申指内幕的，秘密的。
interior ： 指某物的内部，尤指某物的内侧；也可指内地的或国内的。
internal ： 书面用词，医学上多用，指事物的内部，也可指国内的或内政的。
inward ： 指朝着中心或内部方向的，侧重方向而不是位置；也可指内心的隐密活动。

sentence.Network_en: It is a neighborhood beset by all the usual inner-city problems.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是个为各种内城常见问题所困扰的社区。

sentence.Network_en: Once outside the inner breakwater, we began to unfurl all the sails.
sentence.Network_cn: 一驶出内防波堤，我们就扬起了所有的船帆。

sentence.Network_en: When he heard these words, Shinran felt his inner doubts melt away.
sentence.Network_cn: 听到这番话，欣兰感到他内心的疑虑顿时消散了。

list.abs: 电力常用英语 - bingwuo的日志 - 网易博客 ... 内端盖装配 inner shield assembly 内径 inner diameter 纳米 manometer.
内部类（inner class）是被定义于另一个类中的类，使用内部类的主要原因是由于：　　◇ 一个内部类的对象可访问外部类的成员方法 …
内在美（inner beauty）的原意，是指人的内心世界的美，是人的思想、品德、情操、性格等内在素质的具体体现，所以内在美也叫心 …
内连接（Inner Join）是指两个表中指定的关键字相等的值才会出现在结果集中的一种查询方式。HQL中使用关键字inner join进行内连 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English innerra, innra, comparative of in

entry.def: The inner parts of something are the parts which are contained or are enclosed inside the other parts, and which are closest to the centre.

example.ex: She got up and went into an inner office...
example.tran: 她起身进了里间办公室。

example.ex: Wade stepped inside and closed the inner door behind him.
example.tran: 韦德走进去，随手带上了里面的门。

entry.def: Your inner feelings are feelings which you have but do not show to other people.

example.ex: Loving relationships will give a child an inner sense of security...
example.tran: 亲昵关系会给予孩子内心一种安全感。

example.ex: Michael needed to express his inner tensions.
example.tran: 迈克尔需要宣泄一下他内心的紧张。

sentences.sentence: "Beethoven's manuscript looks like a bloody record of a tremendous inner battle"- Leonard Bernstein
"she thinks she has no soul, no interior life, but the truth is that she has no access to it"- David Denby

means.word_mean: 2. located or occurring within or closer to a center;
5. exclusive to a center; especially a center of influence;
6. inside or closer to the inside of the body;

Sentence.sentence: People who do not have access to a good listener may not only be denied the opportunity to heighten their self-awareness, but they are also denied valuable feedback as to the validity and acceptability of their inner thoughts and feelings.

means.word_mean: 里面的；向内的；内部的；接近中心的

sentences.en: The label is on the inner side of the box.

means.word_mean: . 感情等   内心的；未表达出来的；隐藏的

sentences.en: I could not guess what his inner thought might be.
sentences.cn: 我真猜不出他的内心想法。

jushi.english: The label is on the inner side of the box.
I was led to an inner room.
If he had inner doubts, it was not apparent to anyone else.
jushi.chinese: 他即使心中生疑,也不会明显表现出来。
